review_data.title: Gemütliche italienische Bar
review_data.content: Gemütliche italienische Bar mit gutem Kaffee und freundlicher Bedienung. Das Essen sah ebenfalls sehr gut aus.

review_data.title: Spontanes Mittagessen in little Italy!
review_data.content: Wir sind spontan am Restaurant vorbeigekommen. Absolut gemütlich und typisch Italienisch - familiäre Atmosphäre, super nettes und speditives Team, eifache...More

review_data.title: Ein kleines Stück Italien mitten in Zürich
review_data.content: Ein sehr süßes Lokal mit freundlichem Personal, leckeren Häppchen und Wein im Zentrum Zürichs... Immer wieder gerne...

review_data.title: Klein, Fein aber Oho!!
review_data.content: Das Incontro, wie der Name schon sagt, ist ein toller Treffpunkt um einen sensationellen Espresso zu trinken, einen noch besseren...More

review_data.title: Not so good
review_data.content: We were part of reception that was invited by our bank to join a afterwork party. The food was mediocre especially the veal with tuna sauce was not good. The ambiance was bad since it got so crowded, the owner did not as promised close...More

review_data.title: Fun bar with good food
review_data.content: This is a cute bar, great for appetizers and wine. I had the veggie piedina and the cheese and prosciutto platter with a great Barbera wine and it was delicious! Good service and great ambiance.

review_data.title: Ideal zum Apéro mit Freunden
review_data.content: Immer wieder gerne. Sei's um den kleinen Hunger zu stillen oder bei einem Glas Wein den Apéro zu geniessen. Nettes...More

review_data.title: Italian coffeebar
review_data.content: Classic italian bar for an espresso after lunch or just a good place to kill some time. Sadly it is very close to very frequently used road that you can't really enjoy some piece with your espresso if you want to sit outside.

review_data.title: Very nice atmosphere
review_data.content: Incontro is a very nice, small wine bar/café located at the Sihlstrasse Tram stop (Tram #2/#9). The young lady at the bar was very nice. The place has very nice interior with dark wood trim and mirrors behind the bar. Seating area consists of roughly...More

review_data.title: Like in Italy!
review_data.content: We came for coffee and found this nice bar in the heart of Zurich. It felt like being in Italy with authentic drinks and menu combined with great interior and excellent service.

review_data.title: Come in Italia
review_data.content: Trovandomi a Zurigo presso un amico, mi porta in questo bar gestito da una simpatica ragazza italiana. Locale sbarazzino, giovanile...More

review_data.title: Bella Italia
review_data.content: Sehr freundliches Personal, tolles Ambiente, erinnert an Italien! Ich mag das Konzept, dass es nur wenige Gerichte gibt, kleine und...More

review_data.title: Caffè all'italiana
review_data.content: Super freundliches Personal und schönes, gemütliches Ambiente. Leckere Antipasti und vielleicht sogar der beste Kaffee in der Stadt.
